script: You will be given three messages from different people Misty Williams, Joseph Davis, and Jill McKnight.
Jill McKnight: Bring to the meeting a way to get across a river.
Misty Williams: We will rendezvous where the land meets the sea.
Joseph Davis: The time we will meet is when the moon is high.
Given the clandestine messages you have received, tell me as specifically as you can, when and where the meeting is going to happen and what you should bring.
